dateRender.description: custom rendering function for date cells by setting a scoped slot
dateRender.description_zh: 作用域插槽，自定义日期单元格的内容

disabled.description: determine whether the DatePicker is disabled

:disabledDate.description: specify the date that cannot be selected

:getCalendarContainer.description: to set the container of the floating layer, while the default is to create a div element in body
:getCalendarContainer.description_zh: 定义浮层的容器，默认为 body 上新建 div

mode.description_zh: 日期面板的状态（设置后无法选择年份/月份？）

:popupStyle.description: to customize the style of the popup calendar

dropdownClassName.description: to customize the className of the popup calendar

size.description: determine the size of the input box, the height of large and small, are 40px and 24px respectively, while default size is 32px
size.description_zh: 输入框大小，large 高度为 40px，small 为 24px，默认是 32px

suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标

inputReadOnly.description: Set the readonly attribute of the input tag (avoids virtual keyboard on touch devices)
inputReadOnly.description_zh: 设置输入框为只读（避免在移动设备上打开虚拟键盘）

:align.description: this value will be merged into placement's config, please refer to the settings dom-align
:align.description_zh: 该值将合并到 placement 的配置中，设置参考 dom-align

valueFormat.description: optional, format of binding value. If not specified, the binding value will be a Date object
valueFormat.description_zh: 可选，绑定值的格式，对 value、defaultValue、defaultPickerValue 起作用。不指定则绑定值为 moment 对象

events.name: openChange
events.description: a callback function, can be executed whether the popup calendar is popped up or closed
events.description_zh: 弹出日历和关闭日历的回调

events.name: panelChange
events.description: callback when picker panel mode is changed
events.description_zh: 日期面板变化时的回调

events.name: change
events.description: a callback function, can be executed when the selected time is changing
